appendix.title: Ports Used

variablelist.para: By default, OpenIDM ${serverDocTargetVersion} listens on the following ports (specified in the files /path/to/openidm/conf/boot/boot.properties and /path/to/openidm/conf/config.properties):
If you change the default port numbers, you must make the same modification in both the boot.properties and config.properties files.

listitem.para: HTTP access to the REST API, requiring OpenIDM authentication. This port is not secure, exposing clear text passwords and all data that is not encrypted. This port is therefore not suitable for production use.
HTTPS access to the REST API, requiring OpenIDM authentication
HTTPS access to the REST API, requiring SSL mutual authentication. Clients presenting certificates found in the trust store under openidm/security/ are granted access to the system.

appendix.para: The Jetty configuration (in openidm/conf/jetty.xml) references the ports that are specified in the boot.properties and config.properties files.
